website_summaries.verdict: A popular and affordable 2-in-1 shampoo that has been a top seller for decades. A good buy for 3 bottles.
pros: Produces nice lather and has a refreshing scent
Available in choice of 6 formulas and in budget-friendly multi-packs
cons: Some repeat users feel that the formula has changed and isn't as rich as it used to be

customer_reviews.title: Something is not right.
customer_reviews.text: Feels like someone diluted this quite a bit. I have a bottle that I bought at the supermarket and the shampoo is pretty thick - as i've always experienced. customer_reviews.title: Great price, dependable shampoo
